segments.text: Oh man, what a sight in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely overflowing with water rushing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, drying a plate, not noticing a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress make her look so proper.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that puddle on the floor is huge and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, look at the boy on the stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are all splayed out, about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate like he's prepared for the haul.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing by, arm raised, begging for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're totally ignoring the danger they're in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage everywhere, and no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is nice, but this inside mess is shocking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe this is all happening at once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a comedy of errors unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR
